oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photomontage of a World War I Memorial unveiling, and the James Robertson Apartment Hotel. Nashville Tennessean, 1929 June 23.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Nashville Banner
Monuments & memorials; Apartments; Construction
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs; Nashville and Davidson County (Tenn.)--History--Sources
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of a World War I Memorial unveiling in Clarksville, Tennessee, and the James Robertson Apartment Hotel in Nashville, at various phases of construction. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.

oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
